scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. Can I ask you something? We’ve
both been through a lot together...
Yeah, right...

So, what do you think of it all? Have you had
fun? Was it all just hard?
(Well? How should I answer him?)
I don’t know.
It’s been fun.
It’s been hard.
I don’t know.

We’ve been through so much, it’s kinda hard
to say at this point.
Oh...

But I’ll tell you one thing. I’m happy to
have met you, Agumon.
You mean it? Eheheh.
It’s been fun.
We’ve been through a lot, but...
...a lot of fun things have happened, too.
Yeah, that’s the same way I feel.
It’s been hard.

Ever since I came here, it’s been one bad
thing after another.

I can’t wait to get home, back to where my
parents and my friends are waiting for me.
Oh...

But, weren’t there some things that were fun,
or that made you happy?
Yeah, I guess. It’s not like it was all bad.

Tell me, Takuma. What do you think is the
best thing that happened since you came here?
The best thing that happened? Let me think...

(My strongest memories are of meeting Agumon,
and of the time we all spent in the school.)

(Of fighting Fangmon, Archnemon, and
Piemon, of getting swallowed by the fog...)
(What was the best thing that happened?)
Meeting everyone.
Meeting you, Agumon.
Nothing.
Meeting everyone.

Probably just getting to meet everyone. You
know, Minoru, Aoi, Kaito, Miyuki...
Anyone else?
And you, of course.
Eheheh...
Meeting you, Agumon.
The best thing was meeting you, Agumon.

Really?! Because I think the best thing of
all was meeting you, Takuma!
Nothing.

Nope, I can’t do it. I can’t think of
a single good thing.
Really?

We’ve constantly been in danger, my friends
have almost died, and...

...now that I’ve really come to care about
you, we’re going to have to say goodbye.
Takuma...

Haha... Listen to me. The last battle’s still
ahead and I’m talking like we won already.
No, that’s okay.
Listen, Takuma, I’ve been worried.

If we win the fight with the Master, that
means you’ll go back to your world.

But I didn’t want you to think there was
nothing good about the time you spent here.
It’s been bothering me for a while now.
It has? Well, don’t worry, Agumon.
You’ve done all kinds of good things for me.

I’m not about to go back thinking there was
nothing good here.
Well, I’m glad to hear that.
Takuma, I’m going to give this all I got!
